name: 0h Platformer
description:
Explore the world in this totally-not-broken platformer!

Notes:

  1. Try to find the true ending. You'll know it's the true ending if you can see a red arrow. Don't forget you can teleport! ;)
  2. If you fall into a pit, you'll have to restart the game manually.

This game was made in 0 hours for the 2022 0hr game jam.

I realize the game is pretty buggy. I spent around 20 minutes trying to make my own character controller before giving up and using Brackey's movement scripts. This left very little time to finish up all the mechanics and exposition I planned on implementing. Lesson learned: 0 hours is very little time!

All pixel art was made from scratch in the 30 minutes leading up to the jam.
